Review Text: Good, Even though the lighting in the movie was set at night. The night time set was a bit distracting, could barely see some of the characters interacting with the monsters in the apartment.
Review Title: Good Enough
Rating: 4.0

- **Critical Review Behavior**: The user's review behavior reflects discernment, now appreciating films with a renewed lens while maintaining a critical perspective. Their latest feedback notes minor distractions in cinematography yet offers a favorable rating, suggesting an understanding of filmmaking intricacies without sacrificing their excitement for quality narratives.

Overall, this user values high-quality productions and accessibility, showing a dynamic and evolving appreciation for films that align with their interests and preferences.
